condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

title.narrative: Integrated Results and Resources Framework (IRRF)

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.2.5.A

description.narrative: Country has adopted and implemented, with UNDP assistance, legal and regulatory frameworks that enable civil society to function in the public sphere and contribute to sustainable development: Whole of society

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.2.2.1.B

description.narrative: Country has an enabling environment in place leveraging additional resources from public and private sources for the SDGs: Institutional mechanisms

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.2.2.1.A

description.narrative: Country has an enabling environment in place leveraging additional resources from public and private sources for the SDGs: Policy, legal and regulatory frameworks

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.2.1.2.A

description.narrative: Country has inclusive local economic development (LED) strategies and plans in place: With institutional frameworks for implementation in local and regional governments (LRGs)

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.2.1.2.B

description.narrative: Country has inclusive local economic development (LED) strategies and plans in place: With public-private partnerships at scale for accelerating catalytic LED initiatives

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.2.3.1

description.narrative: Parliament has improved capacities to undertake inclusive, effective and accountable law-making

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.2.5.D

description.narrative: Country has adopted and implemented, with UNDP assistance, legal and regulatory frameworks that enable civil society to function in the public sphere and contribute to sustainable development: Groups representing other marginalised populations

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.2.5.B

description.narrative: Country has adopted and implemented, with UNDP assistance, legal and regulatory frameworks that enable civil society to function in the public sphere and contribute to sustainable development: Women's groups

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.2.5.C

description.narrative: Country has adopted and implemented, with UNDP assistance, legal and regulatory frameworks that enable civil society to function in the public sphere and contribute to sustainable development: Youth groups

title.narrative: Output Indicator 3.3.2.2.1

description.narrative: Country has improved capacities for dialogue, consensus-building and reconciliation around contested issues, with equal participation of women and men

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.2.2.C

description.narrative: Women's participation in elections: Country has implemented Temporary Special Measures (TSMs) to ensure women’s participation and representation.

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.2.2.B.2

description.narrative: Women's participation in elections: Number of women on the governing mechanism of the electoral management body

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.2.2.B.3

description.narrative: Women's participation in elections: Proportion of women in governing mechanism

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.2.1.1

description.narrative: Number of Electoral Management Bodies (EMBs) with strengthened capacity to conduct inclusive, effective and accountable elections

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.2.2.A.2

description.narrative: Women's participation in elections: Number of women in voter registry

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.2.2.A.3

description.narrative: Women's participation in elections: Proportion of women in voter registry

description.narrative: Women's participation in elections: Number of people in voter registry

description.narrative: Women's participation in elections: Number of people on the governing mechanism of the electoral management body
